about_the_game:
Dive deep into the lair of the Dragon, with the Legendary Palace Dragon tileset for RPG Maker! Featuring subtle gray and green palettes, craft a custom hideaway for your dragon, complete with dragon pillars, arches and statues!

The Legendary Palace ~ Dragon Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water
Concrete (gray and green)
Scale floor tile (gray and green)
Decorative floor tile (gray and green)
Fiery ground texture
Spike traps
Autotile holes, cracks and gravel
and more!

Walls:

Another scale wall texture, gray concrete, fiery wall texture, and decorative walls.

Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
themed window/wall decor with wings (large and small)
treasure chest (with animated version)
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues – large and small
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
Assorted wings
Jewel lanterns
plus more!

Events and Animations

Includes matching treasure chest and flames in green and white.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
